architecture/ioc-container.title: ğŸ—ï¸ IoC Container
architecture/ioc-container.description: The Inversion of Control (IoC) container is the heart of Sprout Framework. It manages object creation, dependency injection, and lifecycle for all components in your application.

guides/mvc-controller-mapping-guide.title: ğŸŒ MVC Controller Mapping
guides/mvc-controller-mapping-guide.description: Sprout Framework provides a flexible and powerful controller mapping system that handles request routing, path pattern matching, and handler method resolution. The system is built around several key components that work together to map incoming HTTP requests to appropriate controller methods.

overview/configuration.description: Sprout uses a YAML-based configuration system that's loaded at startup. The AppConfig class handles parsing and provides convenient access to configuration properties.
